statements: SELECT * FROM theater_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, rental_cost FROM theater_equipment WHERE availability = true;
SELECT * FROM theater_equipment ORDER BY rental_cost DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, rental_cost FROM theater_equipment WHERE rental_cost < 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS equipment_count FROM theater_equipment WHERE availability = true;
SELECT * FROM theater_equipment WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY rental_cost DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, rental_cost FROM theater_equipment WHERE rental_cost > 100.00;
SELECT equipment_name, rental_cost FROM theater_equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%microphone%' ORDER BY rental_cost ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM theater_equipment WHERE availability = TRUE AND rental_cost BETWEEN 50.00 AND 150.00;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_available_equipment FROM theater_equipment WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM lighting_system WHERE brand='Philips';
SELECT brand, rental_cost FROM sound_system WHERE power_output > 1000;
SELECT id, brand FROM lighting_system ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sound_system WHERE availability=true;
SELECT brand, rental_cost FROM lighting_system WHERE wattage BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT brand, wattage FROM lighting_system WHERE wattage > 100 ORDER BY brand ASC
SELECT * FROM sound_system WHERE availability = true AND rental_cost < 500 ORDER BY rental_cost DESC
SELECT id, rental_cost FROM lighting_system WHERE brand = 'Philips' OR brand = 'Sony'
SELECT brand, power_output FROM sound_system WHERE power_output BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY brand ASC
SELECT * FROM lighting_system WHERE rental_cost > 50 AND availability = true ORDER BY rental_cost DESC
SELECT id, name FROM lighting_systems;
SELECT type, wattage FROM lighting_systems WHERE availability = true;
SELECT * FROM sound_systems ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, rental_cost FROM sound_systems, rental_costs WHERE sound_systems.id = rental_costs.equipment_id;
SELECT id, name, type, availability FROM lighting_systems WHERE wattage > 500;
SELECT * FROM lighting_systems WHERE wattage > 100 AND availability = true;
SELECT id, name, type FROM sound_systems WHERE power_output >= 5000 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, rental_cost, rental_period FROM rental_costs WHERE rental_cost < 100.00 LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT type FROM lighting_systems UNION SELECT DISTINCT type FROM sound_systems;
SELECT ls.name AS lighting_system, ss.name AS sound_system FROM lighting_systems ls INNER JOIN sound_systems ss ON ls.type = ss.type ORDER BY lighting_system ASC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_equipment;
SELECT id, name, rental_cost FROM sound_systems ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, quantity, rental_cost FROM lighting_equipment WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM rental_customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT equipment_id, rental_date, total_cost FROM equipment_rentals WHERE status = 'rented' ORDER BY rental_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_equipment;
SELECT name, quantity FROM sound_systems WHERE rental_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM equipment_rentals ORDER BY rental_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM rental_customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT e.name, r.status FROM lighting_equipment e JOIN equipment_rentals r ON e.id = r.equipment_id WHERE r.status = 'rented';
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, rental_cost FROM lighting_equipment;
SELECT * FROM sound_systems WHERE rental_cost > 500;
SELECT theater_name, location, capacity FROM theaters ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM theater_rentals WHERE return_date IS NULL;
SELECT SUM(total_cost) AS total_revenue FROM rental_history;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, rental_cost FROM lighting_equipment WHERE rental_cost > 1000 ORDER BY rental_cost DESC;
SELECT theater_name, location, capacity FROM theaters WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY theater_name ASC;
SELECT system_name, system_type, rental_cost FROM sound_systems WHERE rental_cost < 500 ORDER BY system_name ASC;
SELECT rental_date, return_date, rental_cost FROM theater_rentals WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT rental_id, equipment_id, total_cost FROM rental_history WHERE return_date IS NULL ORDER BY rental_id ASC;
